At first you might think this is a bad B movie but this film is actually quite good. 

It has a satisfying ending which is key to any film experience. Some of the chase scenes play out really well and have a sort of realistic approach to them (such as breaking partly through a roof when jumping onto it). Also has a good cast which work well. 

I would recommend this film.
